item.title: Today in video games - 11th September: How much use is your Switch 2 getting, and there's Sonic Racing CrossWorlds demo coming next week
item.content:encoded:
Early start today! One of those mornings where my mind woke up before my body. We're back with another day of video games, gathering all of the news and events here, while talking about them with you.

By the way, thank you for your feedback yesterday. We're gathering it to help shape and drive change.

But onto today, and a question that formed in my brain this morning, while sipping coffee and looking at my dormant Switch 2 beside my television. How many of you are using your Switch 2? Does it get frequent use or occasional use? Or, perhaps, none at all.
